response.overview: The 2025 SummerSlam, also promoted as SummerSlam: New Jersey, is an upcoming professional wrestling event produced by WWE. It will be the 38th annual SummerSlam and is scheduled to take place as a two-night event on August 2 and 3, 2025, at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey. This will be the first SummerSlam to take place across two nights. The event will air via pay-per-view (PPV) and livestreaming and will be held for wrestlers from the Raw and SmackDown brand divisions.
response.title: WWE SummerSlam 2025 - Sunday
